content:
Scenario: Professional schedule coordination with children's needs
    Given Tommy and Emma have school schedules, activities, appointments
    And Sarah's work schedule must coordinate with family needs
    When the workplace_elohim helps coordinate scheduling
    Then it should integrate work and family calendars
    And it should surface conflicts between professional and parenting obligations
    And it should help Sarah negotiate necessary flexibility
    And the system should recognize scheduling as complex coordination work
    And workplace should accommodate parent scheduling needs
    And Sarah should have tools to manage impossible complexity
